spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.

Taking damage has a chance to unleash your Auto-Self-Cauterizer, healing you for 357, removing most* bleed effects, and snaring nearby enemies by 30% for 5 sec.

Increases your Kul Tiran or Zandalari Engineering by 30.

*Efficacy may vary.
Your damaging abilities have a chance to grant 5 critical strike rating for 5 sec. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to hurl a R.I.P that bounces among 4 enemies, dealing 90 Fire damage to each. 

Beneficial spells have a chance to hurl a Mechanized External Needle Dispenser, healing up to 4 allies for 127.

Increases your Kul Tiran or Zandalari Engineering by 25.
While Crusade is active, your Mastery is increased by 48.

spells.description: Equip: Increases your Kul Tiran or Zandalari Engineering by 20.

name: Heart of Azeroth

main_spell_tooltip.description: Focus excess Azerite energy into the Heart of Azeroth, then expel that energy outward, dealing 829 Fire damage to all enemies in front of you over 2.4 sec. Castable while moving.

passive_spell_tooltip.description:
Your damaging spells and abilities grant you 2 Haste for 4 sec, stacking up to 10 times. This Haste is lost if you stop using spells or abilities against the initial target.

When you have no stacks of Focused Energy, generate 3 stacks from your first damaging spell or ability.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to strike your target for 115 Fire damage, and heal you for 50% of the damage dealt.

Unique:  Corruption Resistance increased by 10.
Your spells and abilities have a chance to refund 50% of the Holy Power spent on them and heal you for 110.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to increase you and 1 other ally's Haste by 5 for 8 sec and reduce the cooldown of you and 1 other ally's currently slotted Major Essence by 1.0 sec.

Unique:  Corruption Resistance increased by 10.

spells.description: Equip: Harnesses the energy of raw Azerite, awakening exceptional pieces of armor that possess latent powers.

description: A living symbol of hope, borne by the champions of a dying planet. The fate of Azeroth will be shared by all her children.

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Templar's Verdict and Divine Storm by 2% stacking up to 10 times. Spending Holy Power on damaging abilities has a 12% chance to remove Winning Streak!
(4) Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! you get the last Holy Power spent back, you cannot lose Holy Power for the next 4.0 sec, and the damage of your Holy Power abilities are increased by 10%.
(2) Set: Blade of Justice damage increased by 15% and Wake of Ashes damage increased by 10%.
(4) Set: Wake of Ashes increases your damage done by 8% for 8 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Templar's Verdict and Divine Storm by 2% stacking up to 10 times. Spending Holy Power on damaging abilities has a 12% chance to remove Winning Streak!
(4) Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! you get the last Holy Power spent back, you cannot lose Holy Power for the next 4.0 sec, and the damage of your Holy Power abilities are increased by 10%.

Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Templar's Verdict and Divine Storm by 2% stacking up to 10 times. Spending Holy Power on damaging abilities has a 12% chance to remove Winning Streak!
(4) Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! you get the last Holy Power spent back, you cannot lose Holy Power for the next 4.0 sec, and the damage of your Holy Power abilities are increased by 10%.

spells.description: Equip: Add an energy core to the container for every enemy slain, up to a maximum of 20.

Use: Consume all stored energy cores to send a surge of restorative energy through you, instantly healing you for 1.6 million, with an additional 71,971 healing over 10 seconds for each core consumed.  (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Use: Grasp the shard tightly to enrich yourself with crystalline energy, increasing your Mastery by 6,204 for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: The shard draws in remnant energy from defeated enemies, increasing your Mastery by 131 for 15 sec, up to 5 times.
Equip: You champion the cause of Silvermoon City.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Tabard of the Argent Crusade
